channel.title: Network Automation on Awetomate
channel.description: Recent content in Network Automation on Awetomate

item.title: Itential getAdaptersHealth API Call
item.description: The getAdaptersHealth API endpoint allows us to retrieve the data and operational status for all configured adapters on an IAP instance. I typically use this to e.g. determine the proper IAG adapter to onboard a device with or to determine if an adapter is healthy (Status:RUNNING, Connection:ONLINE) as part of my pre-change checks.
